suncertify.client
Class MVCConstructor.LogSetupProperties

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.client.MVCConstructor.LogSetupProperties
Enclosing class:
MVCConstructor
private class MVCConstructor.LogSetupProperties
extends java.lang.Object

This class takes care of loading and saving parameters for initialization the application in the non-networked or netwoked mode This parameters are configurated by using the user interface

Version:
1.2 09 Apr 2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos
